review: I was very excited to finally buy one of these little gadgets and it was very easy to set up. I do enjoy the ability to stream YouTube to my television.  In fact, sometimes I'll find a playlist and just let it stream through.  I just don't seem to have more of a use for it than that. I usually default to my Roku. If you don't have another streaming device, this is a good start. Otherwise, I'd save your money.
